task.summary:
added forms to Sign in and Login - onSubmit not implemented yet
added route guard to prevent unauthenticated visitors to browse wishlists, friends and userspace components
added hiding of User Space, My Wishlists, Friends and Log Out from unauthenticated users using isLoggedIn boolean which is set as boolean by default, changes when firebase says so

signing in now works - it creates a user with email and password, also performs some controls (pw strenght, email format) - sends a verification email - adds created user to the db into users/
// IJ shows error on .then in sing-in.com....ts - ignore it
notification service added - div is shown if a user signed in (successfully or unsuccessfully) (this is an important addition to the application)
modified user Sign Up and Login - users now login using their nicknames instead of emails added funcionality for Logout - it logs out Sign Up and Login are hidden if the user is logged in

changed logging in - user logs in with email and password database rules are changed - only authenticated users can access it now sign in creates users with uniq uid - these have nickname, email, date of reg. and uid myfire service now searches for users using uids user service - getProfile gets profile from localStorage added settings for users - not implemented yet
fixed minor issue - order of jquery.js and bootstrap.js - this fixed the dropdown issue

sign in component modified - notifies about sign in errors reworked header - now listens to updateUserNickname added methods to myFireService - updating user fields and "emits" promises added UserSettings - nickname, password and email - uncomplete
added notification when nickname is changed - modified myfireservice was modified
added friends - added friend adding - user can now send requests

MESSAGE.value:
added forms to Sign in and Login - onSubmit not implemented yet
added route guard to prevent unauthenticated visitors to browse wishlists, friends and userspace components
added hiding of User Space, My Wishlists, Friends and Log Out from unauthenticated users using isLoggedIn boolean which is set as boolean by default, changes when firebase says so

signing in now works - it creates a user with email and password, also performs some controls (pw strenght, email format) - sends a verification email - adds created user to the db into users/
// IJ shows error on .then in sing-in.com....ts - ignore it
notification service added - div is shown if a user signed in (successfully or unsuccessfully) (this is an important addition to the application)

added: email verification checking and other error detection while logging in added myfire.service myfire.service.getUserFromDatabase: looks up user in database using uid and returns snapshot of user's data
modified user Sign Up and Login - users now login using their nicknames instead of emails added funcionality for Logout - it logs out Sign Up and Login are hidden if the user is logged in
succesful login now redirects to home

changed logging in - user logs in with email and password database rules are changed - only authenticated users can access it now sign in creates users with uniq uid - these have nickname, email, date of reg. and uid myfire service now searches for users using uids user service - getProfile gets profile from localStorage added settings for users - not implemented yet
fixed minor issue - order of jquery.js and bootstrap.js - this fixed the dropdown issue

sign in component modified - notifies about sign in errors reworked header - now listens to updateUserNickname added methods to myFireService - updating user fields and "emits" promises added UserSettings - nickname, password and email - uncomplete
added notification when nickname is changed - modified myfireservice was modified
added friends - added friend adding - user can now send requests

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: added friends - added friend adding - user can now send requests
